1: Push block B1, B2, B3, B4 and B5 into pink special area SA3 so that all blocks are in SA3.
2: Move blocks B1 and B2 into SA3.
3: Push block B1, B2, B3, B4 and B5 into pink special area SA1 so that all blocks are in SA1.
4: Move blocks B1 and B2 into SA2.
5: Move blocks B1 and B2 into SA3.
6: Move blocks B1 and B2 into SA3.
7: Push block B1, B2, B3, B4 and B5 into pink special area SA2 so that all blocks are in SA2
8: Move blocks B1 and B2 into SA1.
9: Move blocks B1, B2 and B3 into SA1.
10: Move blocks B1 and B2 into SA2.
